articles.description: The device, called VITAL (Ventilator Intervention Technology Accessible Locally), passed a critical test this week at the Icahn School of Medicine in New York, an epicentre of COVID-19 in the US, NASA said.
articles.content: WASHINGTON: NASA engineers have developed a new, easy-to-build high-pressure ventilator tailored specifically to treat COVID-19 patients.The device, called VITAL (Ventilator Intervention Technology A… [+2612 chars]

articles.title: Will the Future Run on Moon Power? India's Space Agency Bets Yes. - IndustryWeek

articles.author: ET Retail
articles.title: In a first, astronauts 3D-print meat in space - ETRetail.com
articles.description: But there are still limits to the types of food that can withstand microgravity. Anything that can produce crumbs, for instance, is considered dangerous, since food particles can clog a spacecraft’s electrical systems or air filters.
articles.content: Space food is notoriously lackluster, but new technology is slowly revolutionising the way astronauts eat. Whereas the first astronauts in space squeezed their meals from toothpaste-like tubes, today… [+3089 chars]
